  ¶




  
Escape the given html.

  

  

  

  

    
Params

    

      html
      String
    

    
Returns

    

      
      String
    

    
API

    

      private
    
  



        

        
exports.escape = function(html){
  return String(html)
    .replace(/&(?!\w+;)/g, '&amp;')
    .replace(/</g, '&lt;')
    .replace(/>/g, '&gt;');
};
